item.title: NEED help again whit PICKUP
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if you say jordiescape’s wont work, then just use this…

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int sID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

	if (sID != #### && sID != #### && sID != ####) {
                if (sID >= 0 && sID <= 30000) {
                    addItem(sID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
                }
            } else {
                sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }[/code]

it might look messy but still, just use it and be over with it…

@Jordiescape wrote:

Wow…

int[] illegalNumbers = { 12883, 13641, 13658, 13659, 13661, 13662, 13663, 13664, 13660 }; if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] cmd = command.split(" "); for(int i : illegalNumbers) { if(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == i) { sM("You cannot pick this item up."); } else { addItem(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } } }

item.title: NEED help again whit PICKUP
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int sID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

	if (sID != 12883, 13641, 13658, 13659, 13661, 13662, 13663, 13664, 13660 ) {
                if (sID >= 0 && sID <= 30000) {
                    addItem(sID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist,Cheek Item ID And try again");
                }
            } else {
                sendMessage("You can't spawn this item,Register at www.lvserv.ucoz.com to get it...");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Use ::pickup 01050 1! ");
        }
    }[/code]
